title: Is the Casio FX CG50 allowed in exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, Casio fx-CG50 is allowed in some international examination like IB Diploma program, AP Calculator, SAT, PSAT etc. Besides this, it is also allowed in certain stats examination in various countries.
